description: "The ancient kingdoms of mainland Southeast Asia are shown on this 18th century map, including Ava and Pegu (Myanmar), Siam (Thailand), Tonquin (Vietnam), Laos and—between Cochin China (Vietnam) and Camboja (Cambodia)—‘A Savage Nation called KEMOYS’."
title: "An Accurate Map of the East Indies from latest Improvements and Regulated by Astronomical Observations. Engraved for Middleton's Complete System of Geography [cartographic material]."
